name: Satori
description: This strain is a true hybrid in that it is a 50/50 mix of sativa and indica. Mandala Seeds bred Satori by crossing Lucid DreamÂ with another unnamed sativa hybrid. Satori plants flower within 9-10 weeks and produce light green buds with plenty of crystals. The flowers have a unique aroma that is reminiscent of tea and honey.
attributes_title: Energetic, Focused, Happy, Creative, Euphoric, Stress, Depression, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Inflammation, Paranoid, Anxious, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy
